article_title: Macy's Thanksgiving Parade, Holiday Travel Threatened by Winter Storm
article_text:

og.description: A winter storm system hitting parts of Arkansas, Oklahoma and Texas swept toward the densely populated East Coast on Tuesday, promising flight delays and prompting hazardous travel warnings ahead of the long holiday weekend. Even the Macy's Thanksgiving Parade is threatened.
og.title: Thanksgiving Winter Storm Threatens Travel, Macy's Parade
